holidays.title: Day of Restoration of the State of Lithuania
holidays.description: Rejoice in the spirit of patriotism as we celebrate the first independence day of Lithuania.

holidays.title: Do a Grouch a Favor Day
holidays.description: We share our best ideas to enjoy Do A Grouch A Favor Day.

holidays.title: Elizabeth Peratrovich Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate and honor the life of a courageous woman — Elizabeth Peratrovich.

holidays.title: Friday Fish Fry Day
holidays.description: Grab your fork and take a bite of your fried fish this Friday Fish Fry Day.

holidays.title: Innovation Day
holidays.description: If you want to pursue a career in technology then this day is for you.

holidays.title: Janan Luwum Day
holidays.description: Today we celebrate a man who wasn’t afraid to stand for truth on behalf of Ugandans.

holidays.title: Kyoto Protocol Day
holidays.description: Find out what different countries are doing to make the world a more habitable place.

holidays.title: National Caregivers Day
holidays.description: We honor individuals who selflessly provide physical-and emotional support to those who need it most.

holidays.title: National Tartar Sauce Day
holidays.description: As long as you have your tartar sauce next to it, you can never go wrong with seafood.

holidays.title: No One Eats Alone Day
holidays.description: Sit with the loneliest kid and share your meal with him or her as you bond.

holidays.title: Tim Tam Day
holidays.description: Come up with new combinations and variations to enjoy Tim Tam biscuits this year.

holidays.title: Ava Max’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer’s hard work in the world of music makes her a true queen.

holidays.title: Brittney Atwood’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her YouTube career began after starring on her husband’s channel but she’s making her own way.

holidays.title: Elizabeth Olsen’s Birthday
holidays.description: She aped her older sisters and started acting but Elizabeth has established a name for herself.

holidays.title: Ice T’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ice-T served four years in the Army before starting his rap career in the early 1980s.

holidays.title: Lupe Fiasco’s Birthday
holidays.description: Lupe Fiasco, a devout Muslim, jazz enthusiast, and self-described geek, is a hip-hop sensation.
